name: Electric Clothes Dryer Rebate
description: Up to $150 rebate for replacing gas dryer with electric dryer; income-qualified customers may receive up to $350
fullDescription: Silicon Valley Power offers rebates for Santa Clara residents switching from gas to standard electric dryers, with enhanced rebates for income-qualified customers.
whatTheyOffer:
- Up to $150 rebate for electric dryer
- Up to $350 for income-qualified customers
- Must replace gas dryer
- Standard electric dryer option
- More affordable than heat pump option
- Eliminates gas combustion indoors
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a Silicon Valley Power customer
2. Replace gas dryer with electric dryer
3. Purchase qualifying electric clothes dryer
4. Apply online through SVP rebate platform
5. Submit proof of purchase
6. Income-qualified submit additional documentation
